title: HPE security advisory (AV26-127)
description: On February 12, 2026, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE SimpliVity 380 Gen11  versions prior to SimpliVity Support Pack Gen11 (SVTSPGen11) 2026_0116
HPE SimpliVity 380 Gen10 Plus  versions prior to SimpliVity Support Pack Gen10 (SVTSPGen10) 2026_0116
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
